intro: Hedyotis wuzhishanensis, commonly known as the Wuzhishan bedstraw, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, delicate flowers and creeping growth habit. It typically grows in shaded, moist environments such as forests and mountainous regions. Hedyotis wuzhishanensis is of interest to botanists due to its limited distribution and unique ecological adaptations.
